RackHD Releases
Stable | RackHD: version T.B.D Node: 4.x


NOTE: Only Ubuntu *14.04* is supported now.( Ubuntu 16.04 will come soon)

Stable Release(coming soon)

echo deb https://dl.bintray.com/rackhd/debian trusty release | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list
sudo apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv-keys 379CE192D401AB61
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install rackhd

Latest tip on master

echo deb https://dl.bintray.com/rackhd/debian trusty main | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list
sudo apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv-keys 379CE192D401AB61
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install rackhd

Stable Release

git clone https://github.com/RackHD/RackHD
cd RackHD
cd example
# download latest release version , and create the RackHD instance.
vagrant up dev
# start the RackHD services
vagrant ssh dev -c "sudo nf start"
from src code

Latest Tips

use "master" branch for latest tips

Stable/RC

use "release/x.y.z" branch for stable releases or release candidates.

RackHD Developer Summit in Hopkinton

RackHD Dev Summit 2016 will be hold around Nov in Hopkinton, MA, at Dell EMC. The Dev Leads and Core Committers will participate and discuss the next step of RackHD.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: 2016 Nov
  • Service: Web Development

RackHD will have its release in near term. please expect!

RackHD is planning to have verified release in short term, including debian package(Ubuntu 14.04), vagrant box, docker images, and maybe VMWare OVA. Stay tuned.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: Oct 2016
  • Service: Web Development
